name: Custom Bracelet Set for Shaun - final payment
description:
This is a custom order for Shaun for a set of two sterling silver family birthstone bracelets with tourmaline, emerald, tanzanite, and lab alexandrite as discussed. For 10/25 pick up.

Congrats!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~

name: Rough Cut Geometry Stud Earrings in Sterling Silver - Choice of Square, Triangle or Circle
description:
These are my new go-to favorite earrings. They're my take on the faceted silver stud that's currently so popular.

I hand cut these thick squares from solid sterling silver; the tops are left intentionally jagged and the sides are finished to a high polish to add contrast and refinement. These earrings measure 5mm wide, just a touch less than a .25". Sterling silver earring backs are included.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

All items come neatly packaged in a paper gift box and tied with a pretty ribbon. Please note these earrings are made to order and may vary slightly from the photo. yours will be just as pretty new and never worn.

I make everything from scratch starting with sheet silver and wire. All my jewelry designs are original, limited production. Your new piece will be individually hand made just for you with top quality materials and recycled sustainable metals.

Lichen & Lychee Jewelry © All rights reserved.

name: Scandinavian Folk Bird Stud Earrings in Sterling Silver, Checker Chested Chickadee
description:
Folk inspired birds perch on your ear lobes. Each bird is unique with a hand stamped pattern and soft brushed finish. They're backed with handmade posts and come with sterling butterfly backs included. These measure roughly .5 inches across.

See more from this collection here: http://www.etsy.com/shop/LichenAndLychee/search?search_query=scandinavian

Packaged in a paper gift box and tied with a pretty ribbon. Please note these earrings are made to order and may vary slightly from the photo. yours will be just as pretty new and never worn.

I make everything from scratch starting with sheet silver and wire. All my jewelry designs are original, limited production. Your new piece will be individually hand made just for you with top quality materials and recycled sustainable metals.


Lichen & Lychee Jewelry © All rights reserved.

name: Skinny Stacking Ring Set in Sterling Silver - Pick any 3 rings
description:
Pick any three rings in the following textures and finishes and I'll make them to order in any size. The band is just shy of 1.5mm wide.

Also available in groups of 5 or seven or in solid 14k rose, yellow or white gold. Oxidization not available on gold, sorry. 

Choices (shown from top down) 
1. Black Stone Ground
2. Stone Ground
3. Oxidized Hammer Faceted
4. Hammer Faceted
5. Oxidized Coin Edge
6. Oxidized Dashed
7. Black Bark Hammer Textured
8. Bark Hammer Textured
9. Matte Finished
10. Plain Polished


**NOTE** Please give me your ring size in the 'notes to sellers' section upon checkout.

Packaged in a paper gift box tied with a pretty ribbon.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
